title: Security Settings
subtitle: Manage your account security and privacy settings
changePasswordDescription: Enter your current password and choose a new one
twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
setupTwoFactorDescription: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
scanQrCodeInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
backupCodesDescription: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to sign in if you lose access to your authenticator app.
backupCodesWarning: You won't be able to see these codes again unless you generate new ones. Store them securely.
disableTwoFactorDescription: This will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?
securityWarningDescription: This action will reduce your account security
weakPassword: Your password needs to be stronger
enableTwoFactorRecommendation: Enable two-factor authentication to better protect your account
accountProtectionDescription: Your account is protected by industry-standard security measures
accountLockout: Automatic account lockout after multiple failed login attempts
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordChangeError: An error occurred while changing your password
